mapper.insert: INSERT into service_settings (url, initial_zoom, initial_lon, initial_lat, coordinate_system) values (#{url}, #{initialZoom}, #{initialLon}, #{initialLat}, #{coordinateSystem})
mapper.update: UPDATE service_settings set url=#{url}, initial_zoom=#{initialZoom}, initial_lon=#{initialLon}, initial_lat=#{initialLat}, coordinate_system=#{coordinateSystem} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT layer_name FROM serviced_rasters WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ORDER BY z_order ASC
SELECT layer_name FROM serviced_vectors WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ORDER BY z_order ASC
SELECT alpha FROM serviced_rasters WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ORDER BY z_order ASC
SELECT alpha FROM serviced_vectors WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ORDER BY z_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT into serviced_rasters (layer_name, service_id, z_order, alpha) values (#{raster}, #{serviceId}, #{zOrder}, #(alpha))
INSERT into serviced_vectors (layer_name, service_id, z_order, alpha) values (#{vector}, #{serviceId}, #{zOrder}, #(alpha))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM serviced_rasters WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} AND z_order = #{zOrder}
DELETE FROM serviced_vectors WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} AND z_order = #{zOrder}
